pkgmetadata.longdescription:
goto====Installation------------:: $ pip install gotoUsage-----:: >>> import goto >>> page = goto('рег.рф') >>> page.code 200 >>> page.body[:25] '


<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC ' >>> page.mime 'text/html' >>> page.charset 'windows-1251' >>> page.ubody[:25] u'


<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC ' >>> page.headers['content-encoding'] 'gzip' >>> str(page.cookies)[:20] '<cookielib.CookieJar'
